title: ‘I Hope Next Season Will Be Even Better’: Can Pogačar Be More Dominant in 2025?
content:
Pogačar is on a mission to be even more Merckxian while his rivals can only bow their heads: 'He makes me feel like I'm doing something wrong.'

Read the full article at ‘I Hope Next Season Will Be Even Better’: Can Pogačar Be More Dominant in 2025? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
